file_content.text: Shh. The SIS is planning a full-scale strike against the mercs here. Thanks to you.
You were right. The Imperials were paying the mercenaries to attack you. Here's the evidence.
I see. Yeah, these orders are clear. Now we know we have to shut this operation down permanently.
The Republic would be lost without the Jedi Order, thanks.
Now, back into character....
Please don't make me beg again. It's the mercs that pose a threat to you, not a simple worker like me.
Jedi, here? No, please, please don't kill me!
Republic soldier, here? Please, no, don't kill me!
You're one of those Republic sympathizers! Killing your way through here--please, please don't kill me, too!
No, no, please don't kill me!
Shh--I'm Republic military, undercover here. Just pretend everything's on the up-and-up, make some threatening gestures, call me names and what not.
I'm reconning the Empire's efforts to train mercs for urban assault. Was just a rumor, but preliminary observations suggest it's an extensive operation.
Yeah, if I'm right, this has to be snuffed or the Republic will pay a heavy price.
Any reason they'd go after you?
They tried to kill you?
My mobility here is limited. All I got is some tactical observations and a sick feeling in my gut.
Oh mercy, mercy, please spare me!
Seems to me the Imps are training these mercs for covert ground assaults on Coruscant. But to take decisive action, SIS needs proof.
Then we'll take the fight back to the Empire.
They won't get away with it.
Not so fast.
Makes sense. The Imperials wouldn't get their hands dirty if they didn't have to.
You're probably right.
Bunch of gutless scum.
Just say the word, and I'll make those mercenaries wish they'd never taken this job.
I'll deal with the mercs.
Appreciate the offer, but the Empire will only hire more guns if we wipe out this batch.
Ever think about paying off the mercenaries, have them do the same to the Empire?
That's not a bad idea.
I don't negotiate with mercs.
The Imperials?
They haven't stolen anything. Must mean someone else is making it worth their while.
Doesn't that violate the neutrality on Nar Shaddaa?
That's against the rules.
Show me an Imperial who plays by the rules, and I'll show you an Imperial who hasn't been caught cheating yet.
The Hutts don't tolerate open warfare on their turf. Makes dealing with the Imps sticky, but we can use it.
All we need is some evidence of the Empire's involvement in these attacks. I figure the mercs will have something. Think you can get it?
You can count on me.
Leave it to me.
Piece of cake.
Good. These mercs aren't the sociable type, so take them down fast. Bring me what you find.
I didn't see nothing! I swear it! Just minding my own business, happy to be breathing.
Don't want to. [Refuse quest]
Well, that's a major disappointment. Sure glad I risked my cover talking to you.
I'm no threat to you. Keep moving, please, nothing to see here.
No, not again! Please, I don't want no trouble.
Just keeping up the front. So, tell me, am I right? Are the mercs being trained to assault Republic cities?
Republic needs more soldiers like you, my friend.
Don't look now, spacer, but you're turning into one valuable Republic op. You have our thanks.
Thanks. You just made the Republic a much safer place.
I told you before, I don't know nothing! Please, just leave me to my work.
This is serious.
Bad news.
Do you have proof?
Can you prove it?
I'll pretend you're my enemy.
Let's teach those mercs that working for the Empire is bad for their health, and secure some of their orders so I can show SIS.
